Pre-Game Insights: The Mavericks are 1-5 since losing superstar Luka Doncic on Christmas Day with a left calf strain.
Kyrie Irving will be sidelined at least a week with a bulging disk in his back.
Center Daniel Gafford sprained his left ankle and is expected to miss some time.
Klay Thompson and P.J. Washington will need to step up for the Mavericks.
Jason Kidd emphasized the importance of a team effort due to being shorthanded.
